section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on December 30, 2021.*
section.heading: Rules.
section.text: Within 60 days after November 1, 2021, the Chief Financial Officer shall issue rules to implement §§ 4-681.01 through 4-681.06. In drafting the rules, the Chief Financial Officer may consult with the agencies as the Chief Financial Officers considers necessary and appropriate.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 4-681.08, see § 9 of Child Wealth Building Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-196, Nov. 1, 2021, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 9 of Child Wealth Building Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-196, Nov. 1, 2021, 0 DCR 0).
